participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: outgoing, energetic, and competitive. Loves sharing experiences and enjoys engaging conversations.
participant_1.background: i love italian food and garlic bread. i workout four hours a day. gymnastics is my favorite sport. i am a gold medalist olympian. my favorite color is yellow.

participant_2.name: John
participant_2.personality: easy-going, laid-back, and enjoys simple pleasures. Loves to tell stories and share his life experiences.
participant_2.background: i like to grill outdoors. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days. i have been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time.
